attributes.action: Get these adverts on British Television
attributes.additional_details:
Hi there,

I want you all to watch this video and see how many of you can actually turn around and say you don't want to sort your driving out and calm down on the roads:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xS1enJr49os

These adverts really got to me, and made me want to calm my driving down and pay more attention, and I personally believe that these types of adverts should be on the television like they are in countries like australia. Yes they're graphic, but they get through to people. Please sign this petition and lets make britain's roads safer!
